articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Opera "The Dream of the Red Chamber"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Opera "The Dream of the Red Chamber"
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed the opera "The Dream of the Red Chamber" at the Hamhung Grand Theatre. 
					 The Phibada Opera Troupe has energetically waged a campaign to recreate the opera "The Dream of the Red Chamber" as required by the new century this year, the "year of DPRK-China friendship," perfecting all elements of representation at a high level and successfully completing its recreation. 
					
					 After enjoying the opera, Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction over the fact that its creators and artistes completed and produced the excellent opera faithfully meeting the requirements of the original work by devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm and he highly appreciated the successful performance and extended thanks to all the creators and artistes who participated in the recreation of the opera.
					
					 The Phibada Opera Troupe, which kicked off the creation of the Sea of Blood-style revolutionary opera, fully demonstrated once again its capability as an able and prestigious art troupe in the course of recreating the opera as befitting an art troupe that protects and carries forward the noble legacy of the five revolutionary operas, he said, adding that this is a clear proof of the validity and vitality of the WPK's Juche-oriented literary and art idea and the great potential of the art creating staff.
					
					 It is something to be highly proud of that students of a university or newcomers from it, in particular, have successfully played their main or minor parts of the opera, he noted, stressing that this is a clear indication that the WPK's policy of training art reserves is very just and the tradition of the Juche-oriented art is given steady continuity.
					
					 Noting that the achievements made by the Phibada Opera Troupe go to prove that it is possible to bring about an exceptional creative upswing when the innovative view of the 21st century is combined with the mode of creation and work-style displayed in the 1970s, he set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for steadily developing the literature and arts in the DPRK.
					
					 Among the audience were Secretary of the WPK Central Committee Kim Ki Nam, Department Directors of the WPK Central Committee Kim Kyong Hui, Choe Ik Gyu, Pak Nam Gi and Kim Yang Gon, Secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK Kim Yong Gyu and other leading officials and KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the Korean People's Army, officials in the fields of literature and arts and media and creators and artistes.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Outbursts Rebuked
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Outbursts Rebuked
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak, addressing a recent meeting commemorating the Memorial Day, blustered that the north is "threatening global peace and security" and south Korea these days and cried out for "resolutely and decisively coping with the threat." He, at the same time, let loose a spate of balderdash about "denuclearization", "dialogue" and "cooperation". When meeting with a U.S. inter-agency delegation on a visit to south Korea earlier, he begged the U.S. for its "cooperation" over the issue of the DPRK's nuclear test and missile launch. He was so impertinent as to utter that south Korea "would render huge assistance to the north if it dismantled its nukes."
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a signed commentary carried in this regard terms what Lee uttered an unpardonable challenge and mockery of the DPRK as it was treacherous remarks which could be let loose only by those seized with antagonism against fellow countrymen and ambition for confrontation with them.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is a publicly recognized fact that the stability of the Korean Peninsula and global peace are gravely threatened by the U.S. brandishing nuclear weapons and the puppet war maniacs, its lackeys.
					
					 With no sophism can the puppet bellicose forces cover up the truth about the evermore growing threat of aggression against the north or conceal their dirty colors as the nuclear war servants of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 It was none other than Lee Myung Bak who took the lead in creating complexity in settling the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula and torpedoing the process of denuclearization, while echoing his U.S. master's claim that "north Korea should dismantle its nukes first" from the very day he came to power and frantically kicking up a racket of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 His reckless remarks are, in the final analysis, nothing but a wordplay and a smokescreen to conceal his scenario to hurt and stifle compatriots and realize his criminal ambition for "achieving unification by invading the north" in league with foreign forces including the U.S.
					
					 Every sin brings its punishment with it and a criminal is bound to be judged by history.
					
					 Lee will not be able to escape a stern judgment of history for having slandered the DPRK with his trite sophism about "threat from the north" and kicked up with bloodshot eyes a racket to stifle fellow countrymen in cooperation with outside forces.
					
					 He had better drop his foolish dream of seeking a way out in the confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Sidestepping Solution to Problem of Part-timers
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Sidestepping Solution to Problem of Part-timers
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea issued a statement on June 9 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group for sidestepping the solution to the problem of the part-time workers.
					 The statement lashed out at the Lee "government" and the "Grand National Party" for contemplating deleting an article from the existing "law on the part-time job" which calls for making part-timers regular workers when the period of hiring them goes beyond two years.
					
					 This is little short of a repeated declaration by the present "government" that it would not be responsible for millions of part-timers as it has sought to meet only the interests of the big businesses, talking about "ensuring the flexibility in the labor market," it charged. 
					
					 Many part-timers have been unreasonably dismissed by enterprise owners and have lost even their lives, the statement noted, adding that the responsibility for this deplorable situation entirely rests with the Lee "government" and the GNP that have followed an economic policy in favor of the big businesses. 
					
					 If the motion calling for the retrogressive revision of "the law on the part-time job" is brought up for discussion at the "extraordinary session of National Assembly", the workers will intensify the struggle to judge the present regime forsaken by the people, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Sincere Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Sincere Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Academic Headquarters and the Media Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held an academic seminar in Seoul on June 11 on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of the publication of the joint declaration at which they demanded the puppet authorities sincerely implement the inter-Korean declarations.
					 Speakers accused the Lee Myung Bak "government" of bringing to naught overnight all the achievements made after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and allowed the U.S. to make a mockery of the destiny of the nation, declaring that it is an essential task for national reunification to put an end to the submission to the U.S. and its subjugation and get the "National Security Law" abolished.
					
					 They chided the conservative media, the trumpeters on the payroll of the Lee "government," for creating uneasiness by opening "information about the north" to the public in a bid to drive the situation on the Korean Peninsula into the military tension and openly releasing reports aimed at propagandizing that "the U.S. is absolutely right".
					
					 A joint statement of the two organizations was read out at the seminar. It urged the Lee "government" to respect the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and sincerely implement them.

articles.title: Improved Inter-Korean Relations Called for by S. Korean Religious Body
articles.content:
Improved Inter-Korean Relations Called for by S. Korean Religious Body
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The National Council of Christian Churches in south Korea issued a statement on Thursday demanding  the group of traitors opt for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					 The statement referred to the fact that the inter-Korean relations are inching close to the phase of confrontation and war these days.
					
					 The peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula should not be given up under any circumstances, it said, and went on;
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government" should neither misuse the inter-Korean relations for achieving its political purpose nor increase the pressure on the north in a bid to push the situation to the brink of a war. 
					
					 The Lee's "government" would be well advised to regard dialogue with the north as a priority task and make efforts to improve the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle for National Reunification Supported in Mexico
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle for National Reunification Supported in Mexico
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A joint statement was issued by political parties and public organizations in Mexico on June 5 on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration.  They were the People's Socialist Party, the Socialist Party, the Socialist Popular Party, the National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, the Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Fellowship Institute to Honor the Memory of President Kim Il Sung, the Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association.
					The statement recognized that the historic June 15 joint declaration provided by General Secretary Kim Jong Il is a signpost of Korea's reunification and a great programme for achieving independent reunification as it put the inter-Korean relations onto a new orbit.
					
					 It strongly denounced the Lee Myung Bak group for its reckless anachronistic confrontational act of totally denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, bringing back the fascist dictatorial era and escalating the confrontation with the north. 
					
					 It expressed full support and solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle to reenergize the movement for national reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself" under the slogan "Let us dynamically advance along the road of independent reunification, holding aloft the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration!" this year. 
					
					 It hailed the resolute and strong counter-measures taken by the DPRK against the criminal acts the U.S. and its followers perpetrated by abusing the UNSC over the DPRK's recent satellite launch for peaceful purposes and its successful nuclear test conducted to defend its supreme interests. 
					
					 It called upon all the political parties, governments and organizations of the world desirous of peace and reunification of Korea to positively support and encourage the struggle of the Workers' Party and people of Korea to foil the moves of the anti-reunification forces and achieve the independent reunification of the country under the banner of the historic June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, and Edmond Jouve, director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, separately issued statements on June 5 and 8 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez in his statement said that the WPK has grown stronger organizationally and ideologically over the past 45 years under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, adding that this was a basic factor of accelerating socialist construction in the DPRK. 
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il's distinguished political caliber and foresightedness as a leader were fully demonstrated in the fact that the north-south summit took place and the June 15 joint declaration was adopted in Pyongyang in June 2000, the statement expressed conviction that President Kim Il Sung's last instruction for national reunification would be carried out without fail thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Edmond Jouve noted in his statement that Kim Jong Il has laid a firm foundation for building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in the DPRK over the past 45 years by successfully carrying forward the cause of Kim Il Sung, the father of socialist Korea.
					
					 The DPRK is winning one victory after another by firmly holding its initiative at all times even under the complicated international situation thanks to Kim Jong Il's  outstanding far-sighted leadership, stressed the statement.

articles.title: Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Commemorated in Italy
articles.content:
Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to Be Commemorated in Italy
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated with due ceremony on June 8. 
					 Miriam Pellegrini Ferri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony.
					
					 It discussed the committee's action plan for widely introducing the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung in the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence through media and holding colorful political and cultural events till 2012.
